responseText.label: What's your response to the tribunal?
responseText.hint: Use this box to provide any supporting material. You can also upload a file if you wish.

hasSupportingMaterial.label: Supporting material
hasSupportingMaterial.hint: Do you have any supporting material you want to provide?

supportingMaterialFile.label: Provide supporting material
supportingMaterialFile.li1: you can upload letters, photos or documents to support your response
supportingMaterialFile.li2: if you are taking a picture of a letter, place it on a flat surface and take the picture from above
supportingMaterialFile.li3: if you are uploading written documents with tracked changes, make sure that tracked changes are turned on
